languages.text: Allies suffer {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against them.
languages.original_text: Союзники получают на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора</u>% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от сил навигатора, а также +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОС навигатора)</u> при {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверках на сопротивление{/g} силам навигатора.

traits.locale_text: Allies get <u>(Navigator's Perception)</u>% less damage from powers of Path of the Open Eye and gain +<u>2×(Navigator's PER bonus)</u> to resistance checks against this path Navigator powers.

Allies get <u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +<u>(2 × Navigator's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against Navigator powers.

Allies get <u>Navigator's PER</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +<u>(2 × Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against Navigator powers.

Allies suffer {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against them.

languages.text: Союзники получают на {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от сил навигатора, а также +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} при выполнении проверок на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} этим силам.
languages.original_text: Allies get <u>Navigator's PER</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +<u>(2 × Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against Navigator powers.

traits.locale_text: Союзники получают на ВОС навигатора% меньше урона от сил Пути неусыпного взора, а также +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОС навигатора) при проверках на сопротивление силам навигатора, следующего этому пути.

Союзники получают на ВОС навигатора% меньше урона от сил Пути неусыпного взора, а также +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОС навигатора) при проверках на сопротивление силам навигатора, следующего этому пути.

Союзники получают на {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от сил навигатора, а также +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} при выполнении проверок на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} этим силам.

languages.text: 所有盟友在对抗导航者能力时，承受的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低{uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}%，所有{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}获得{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}点加值。
languages.original_text: Allies get <u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +<u>(2 × Navigator's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against Navigator powers.

traits.locale_text: 开眼之路的所有能力，对盟友造成的伤害降低导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}%。所有盟友在对抗此类导航者的力量时，所有{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}获得加值，等同于（2×导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）。

所有盟友在对抗导航者能力时，承受的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低{uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}%，所有{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}获得{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}点加值。

languages.text: Los aliados sufren un {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} % menos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de poderes de navegante y reciben +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} a las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} contra ellos.
languages.original_text: Allies get <u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +<u>(2 × Navigator's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against Navigator powers.

traits.locale_text: Los aliados reciben un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del navegante % menos de daño de poderes de la Senda del Ojo Abierto y ganan un +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del navegante) a las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} contra los poderes de esta senda.

Los aliados sufren un {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} % menos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de poderes de navegante y reciben +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} a las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} contra ellos.

languages.text: Verbündete nehmen <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g} des Navigators</u> % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} von Navigator-Kräften und erhalten +<u>(2 × Navigator-WAH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> auf {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen die Navigatorkräfte.
languages.original_text: Allies get <u>Navigator's PER</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +<u>(2 × Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against Navigator powers.

traits.locale_text: Verbündete nehmen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Navigators % weniger Schaden von Kräften des Pfads des offenen Auges und erhalten +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Navigators) auf {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen die Navigatorkräfte dieses Pfads.

Verbündete erleiden {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch Navigatorkräfte und erhalten +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} auf {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen sie.

languages.text: Les alliés subissent {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en moins contre les pouvoirs du navigateur et bénéficient de +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} aux {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} à ces pouvoirs.
languages.original_text: Allies suffer {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against them.

traits.locale_text: Les alliés subissent {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en moins contre les pouvoirs du navigateur et bénéficient de +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} aux {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} à ces pouvoirs.

Les alliés subissent {uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en moins contre les pouvoirs de Navigator et bénéficient de +{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7} aux {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} contre ces pouvoirs.

languages.text: 味方は航宙士のパワーで受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が{uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}%され、それに対する{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}が+{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}される。
languages.original_text: Allies get <u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from Navigator powers and gain +<u>(2 × Navigator's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against Navigator powers.

traits.locale_text: 味方は開かれた眼の道の力によって受けるダメージが航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}%分現象し、航宙士の力に対する{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}へ(2 × 航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})分のボーナスを得る。

味方は航宙士のパワーで受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が{uip|PerceptionBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}%され、それに対する{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}が+{uip|ChanceBonus|2d5c8abfc6ff4b2fa09971935817ebc7}される。
